body:
See: https://github.com/spack/spack/issues/8232

This updates Spack to apply environment modifications after loading modules: those associated with external packages, as well as those associated with compilers. This means that:

* Spack settings for `CC` take precedence over modules setting `CC`
* Spack `prepend_path` actions take precedence over environment variable path modifications from modules

Before this PR both of these were not necessarily true.
title: apply spack env var updates after module loads
